name: Curse of the Betrayer Kings
description:
The Betrayer Kings have cursed the kingdom! Train, make it through the Deep Roads, and face those lords of deceit!

Or so the last few groups of heroes have tried. Now, with only the oddest of companions- a prideful weasel, lost robot, and faceless mage, you must do what the others could not. But beware- your own allies may prove bigger obstacles than your foes.

Controls:

Left Click to select a character, move, attack, and hit buttons. Blue tiles can be moved to, red shaded tiles will do one damage, black will do three, and the green tiles on the bosses heal them.

Known Bugs:

Don't double click on heroes.

Credit to music goes to:

All other assets created during the jam.
